text: The Frigid Sea () is a 1954 Soviet drama movie directed by Yuri Yegorov.Как тебе такое, Робинзон? История русских моряков, выживших на ШпицбергенеМоре студеное (1954) It stars Nikolay Kryuchkov, Valentin Grachyov, and Gennadi Yudin. == Actors == * Nikolay Kryuchkov as Aleksey Khimkov * Valentin Grachyov as Vanya Khimkov, his son (as Valya Grachyov) * Gennadi Yudin as Crewman Stepan Shaparov * Elza Lezhdey as Varvara * Mark Bernes as Okladnikov * Aleksandr Pelevin as Vernizobar == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Yuri Yegorov
title: The Frigid Sea
